headline: Seeking New Narratives In Ohio Town That Stood  As Symbol of Opioid Crisis
abstract: Portsmouth, Ohio, is trying. But when an area gets labeled — say Appalachia with poverty or Chicago with gun violence — how do you get people to realize it is also about a lot more?
lead_paragraph: PORTSMOUTH, Ohio — Jeremy Burnside has a dream that someday, someone will write a story about his town that has nothing to do with drugs.
